item.description: only for self tracking and keep motivated to read more. some books are censored and not shared with the public :-) reading thinking, fast and slow: daniel kahneman the diet compass - bas kast censored: wind censored: knight < pipe ego is the enemy - ryan holiday do the work - steven pressfield atomic habits - james clear 365 days with self discipline - martin meadows ignore everybody - hugh macleod the war of art - steven pressfield moonwalking with einstein - joshua foer how to take smart notes - s√∂hnke ahrens read in 2022 goal: 1/10
